title: Heading h1
text: Новости загружаются по AJAX в формате JSON и отрисовываются через React.

title: Heading h2
text: Короткие текстовые заметки отрисовываются как есть.

title: Heading h3
text: Длинные - обрезаются на стадии отрисовки и добавляется кнопки раскрытия на странице(+) и во всплывающем окне(W).

Science is much more than a body of knowledge. It is a way of thinking. This is central to its success. Science invites us to let the facts in, even when they don’t conform to our preconceptions.
author: Carl Sagan

text: We are not simply in the universe, we are part of it. We are born from it. One might even say we have been empowered by the universe to figure itself out — and we have only just begun.
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson, The Greatest Story Ever Told
